mdRecord.dcterms:title: Les oeuures poetiques de Pontus de Tyard, Seigneur de Bissy: asçauoir, trois liures des Erreurs amoureuses. Vn liure de Vers liriques. Plus vn recueil des nouuelles œuures Poëtiques
De coelestibus asterismis
Oeuvres poetiques de Pontus de Tyard
Ponti Thyardei, Bissiani, ad Petrum Ronsardum, De coelestibus asterismis poëmatium
Tyard, Pontus de, 1521-1605. Works. 1573
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Tyard, Pontus de, 1521-1605 [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:contributor: Douglas H. Gordon Collection of French Books (University of Virginia) [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: First work in volume with (as issued): [8] p. bound after p. 164): Ponti Thyardei, Bissiani, ad Petrum Ronsardum, De coelestibus asterismis poëmatium. -- Parisiis : Apud Galéotum à Prato, via Iacobæa, sub Naui aurea, 1573. Binder: Bauzonnet-Trautz. Unidentified armorial bookplate, two crests, side-by-side. Pencilled notes that the book belonged to Chédeau, Lebeuf de Mongermont, de Ruble and H. de Backer. Gordon Collection. Bookplate of Douglas Gordon. Gordon list 212. [original]

SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: First work in volume with (as issued): [8] p. bound after p. 164): Ponti Thyardei, Bissiani, ad Petrum Ronsardum, De coelestibus asterismis poëmatium. -- Parisiis : Apud Galéotum à Prato, via Iacobæa, sub Naui aurea, 1573. Binder: Bauzonnet-Trautz. Unidentified armorial bookplate, two crests, side-by-side. Pencilled notes that the book belonged to Chédeau, Lebeuf de Mongermont, de Ruble and H. de Backer. Gordon Collection. Bookplate of Douglas Gordon. Gordon list 212. [original]
